actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department; OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend section 303 of the Federal Land Policy and Management Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act to prescribe penalties for violations of regulations issued under such Act. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to grant enforcement responsibilities for Federal laws relating to public lands to certain persons who are not and will not be authorized to carry firearms.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 303 of the Federal Land Policy and Management Act.
